name: Alfred the Snail
description:
It's that season again Autumn, but for some this time represents danger. Help Alfred a brave snail avoid all the falling leaves at the park.

CONTROLS

- Click anywhere on the scrren to move Alfred

- Press ESC to pause the game

DEVELOPEMENT HISTORY

Game made for the Autumn Annual Scarecrow Jam 2021, my first game jam entry ever.

CREDITS

- Programming and Desing: Rafael Botelho

- Art: Designed by Katemangostar, Freepik, Pikisuperstar, Sketchepedia / Freepik, Unity Technologies,  RAFMANIX, Madder, Action Studios

- Audio: Tim Beek,  Cabled_Mess, Rizwan Ashraf
